description: Building on skills gained through Music 111 and 112, third-semester music majors develop more advanced competencies: sight-singing more chromatic melodies and melodies that modulate; identifying and notating progressively complex melodic, rhythmic, and harmonic idioms. Prerequisites: Music 112/114. Co-requisite: Music 213. Offered annually in the Fall Semester.
name: Aural Skills III
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Music 112/114. Co-requisite: Music 213. Offered annually in the Fall Semester.
